apis.description:
Retrieve the paginated list of favorite courses for the current user. If the user has not chosen
any favorites, then a selection of currently enrolled courses will be returned.

See the {api:CoursesController#index List courses API} for details on accepted include[] parameters.

operations.notes:
Retrieve the paginated list of favorite courses for the current user. If the user has not chosen
any favorites, then a selection of currently enrolled courses will be returned.

See the {api:CoursesController#index List courses API} for details on accepted include[] parameters.

parameters.name: exclude_blueprint_courses
parameters.description: When set, only return courses that are not configured as blueprint courses.

apis.description:
Retrieve the paginated list of favorite groups for the current user. If the user has not chosen
any favorites, then a selection of groups that the user is a member of will be returned.

operations.notes:
Retrieve the paginated list of favorite groups for the current user. If the user has not chosen
any favorites, then a selection of groups that the user is a member of will be returned.

apis.description:
Add a course to the current user's favorites.  If the course is already
in the user's favorites, nothing happens.

operations.notes:
Add a course to the current user's favorites.  If the course is already
in the user's favorites, nothing happens.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
The ID or SIS ID of the course to add.  The current user must be
registered in the course.

apis.description:
Add a group to the current user's favorites.  If the group is already
in the user's favorites, nothing happens.

operations.notes:
Add a group to the current user's favorites.  If the group is already
in the user's favorites, nothing happens.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
The ID or SIS ID of the group to add.  The current user must be
a member of the group.

apis.description: Remove a course from the current user's favorites.

operations.notes: Remove a course from the current user's favorites.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID or SIS ID of the course to remove

apis.description: Remove a group from the current user's favorites.

operations.notes: Remove a group from the current user's favorites.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID or SIS ID of the group to remove

apis.description:
Reset the current user's course favorites to the default
automatically generated list of enrolled courses

operations.notes:
Reset the current user's course favorites to the default
automatically generated list of enrolled courses

apis.description:
Reset the current user's group favorites to the default
automatically generated list of enrolled group

operations.notes:
Reset the current user's group favorites to the default
automatically generated list of enrolled group

context_id.description: The ID of the object the Favorite refers to

context_type.description: The type of the object the Favorite refers to (currently, only 'Course' is supported)
